Blog: Parse CMS tags in post contents
Use categories id in posts URLs
Number of post to display in the RSS feed.
新闻: 显示在RSS订阅中的邮件数量。

Blog: Relative to current skin directory eg. images/rsslogo.jpg
新闻: 指定到当前皮肤目录下，例如images/rsslogo.jpg

Blog: Go to http://recaptcha.net/api/getkey to get keys
All comments will appear immediately without the need for approval by admin.
新闻: 不通过管理员批准，所有评论直接显示

Blog: Only comments made by users that are logged in will automaticlly be approved.
新闻: 只有登录用户的评论可被自动批准

Blog: The number of recent post to be displayed in the menu. 0 to disable.
新闻: 在菜单中显示最近邮件的数量。0表示不显示

Blog: The number of tags to display in tag cloud. 0 Will disable tag cloud
新闻: 在标签云中显示标签的数量。0表示不显示

Blog: eg. news" will make the blog accessible from domain.com/news. Must not contain any slashes. Blank for default"
新闻: 不能包含斜杠，留空表示默认

Blog: The number posts displayed per page. 0 to disable pages.
新闻: 每页显示邮件数量。0表示不显示

Blog: You must be logged in to post a comment.
新闻: "您还没有登录，必须登录后才能评论哦。"
